title: No token
body:
I got an s on annie in aram but i got no token and i am lvl 5 with her.
file:///C:/Users/Laptop/Pictures/Screenshots/Screenshot%20(1).png

replies.body:
Hey there,

Mastery tokens can only be earnt on Summoners Rift games, you can still earn hextech rewards (Chests) on ARAM though.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide#h1q5
